segments.text: No , Dave . I haven't wrecked my jeep . I'm calling to offer you a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like you to manage a new online auction site we're building .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't play hard to get . The pay is good . You'd be working with Elvin again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Elvin doesn't hold a grudge , if that's what you're worried about .
segments.speaker: S1
